answer:
A replacement dose of rotavirus vaccine is not recommended if an incomplete dose is administered for any reason (e.g., infant spits or regurgitates the vaccine). Any remaining doses in the rotavirus vaccine series should be completed according to the recommended schedule a 2, 4 and 6 months. Learn more about rotavirus vaccine here.
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:

g.
, infant spits or regurgitates the vaccine).

Any remaining doses in the rotavirus vaccine series should be completed according to the recommended schedule a 2, 4 and 6 months.
Learn more about rotavirus vaccine here.

question: Hi, My son spat out most (about 3/4) of the rotavirus vaccine today. Will he still be able to build immunity from the small amount he got? Thank you,
question_variation_0: how much vaccine is needed for rotavirus
question_variation_1: do my kids get rotavirus vaccine everyday
question_variation_2: will rotavirus vaccine help him build immunity
